message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. Given its value to you, I believe it's worth more than $8000. Considering its true worth, I am offering it to you for $10000. This is a special opportunity to secure this exceptional product at a price that is both fair and beneficial for both parties. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
